title: singapore-street-names
subtitle: Singapore street names extracted from OpenStreetMap
description: I find Singapore street names fascinating. This dataset is a catalog of the street names I extracted from OSM. It is not perfect because I rely on regex to identify street names and a local LLM to assign labels. I hope it serves you well for getting started. You can find the source code used for generating this dataset on [GitHub](https://github.com/evgeniyarbatov/singapore-streets).
